#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		int n;
		scanf("%d",&n);
		vector<int> arr1(n);
		vector<int> arr2(n);
		int ans=0;
		int i;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
			scanf("%d",&arr1[i]);
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
			scanf("%d",&arr2[i]);
		sort(arr1.begin(),arr1.end());
		sort(arr2.begin(),arr2.end());
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
			ans += arr1[i]*arr2[i];
		printf("%d\n",ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
